actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Public Works, S. Rept. 94-480.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: An original bill to extend certain authorizations under the Solid Waste Disposal Act, as amended.

summary.text: Extends until September 30, 1976, the monetary authorizations under the Solid Waste Disposal Act (previous extensions expired June 30, 1975). Authorizes $76,000,000 for the period July 1, 1975, through September 30, 1976, to carry out research, technical assistance, planning support, and administrative responsibilities under the Solid Waste Disposal Act. Authorizes $25,000,000 for the period July 1, 1975, through September 30, 1976, for resource recovery demonstration projects under such Act.

titles.title: An original bill to extend certain authorizations under the Solid Waste Disposal Act, as amended.
